lead_paragraph: Manchester United must learn to ignore their critics as their performances may have been affected by the intense scrutiny the team have been under throughout the campaign, manager Louis van Gaal said on Wednesday

headline.print_headline: Man United Must Learn to Ignore Critics, Says Van Gaal
headline.main: Man United Must Learn to Ignore Critics, Says Van Gaal
